message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $18,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and features.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This product is truly top-notch and I'm confident it's worth the investment.

I understand that the product is top-notch, but I still think $15,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
